p: The results show that the use of plants and their essential oils used in traditional medicine in the Tehuacan-Cuicatlan valley Puebla can be validated, since several compounds have antimicrobial activity against Gram-positive, Gram-negative bacteria, and yeasts. Several essential oils compounds are lipophilic and can interact with bacterial cytoplasmic membranes, increasing membrane permeability [ 4, 22, 23, 24, 25].
